page.title: 16Glanvilles Wootton-Teenager
page.content: I wake up at 7.30 am and get dressed.I get on the school bus at about 8.22. I get to school at roughly 8.50 am. Then it's the usual boring day at school,consisting of 8 lessons and 3 breaks.I get home at 4.50 pm and feed my pets.Then I watch television and do as much homework as I feel like or as much as I've got time for,which is usually quite a lot because there's nothing to do in our village. I go to a youth club 3 miles away once a week. I go to bed quite early if there's nothing on telly,otherwise I go to a friend's house to watch a video.In my eyes it's a fairly boring day. __________LOCAL RECREATION___________ Skittles & Whist are played regularly. Charity fund raising events & Women's Institute meetings are enjoyed through -out the year in the surveyed area.
